Title: Establishes a subpart to hear housing matters related to buildings of thirty-five or less units
Summary: Establishes a subpart devoted to actions and proceedings involving buildings of thirty-five or less units within the housing part.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd ยง110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to establishing a subpart to hear housing matters related to buildings of thirty-five or less units
